amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new paragraph with respect to limitation.

action.text: Mr. Baird raised a point of order against the Weldon (FL) amendment (A003). Mr. Baird stated that the provisions of the Weldon(FL) amendment are not germane to the bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Weldon (FL).
